mapper.select: select case when exists( SELECT * FROM ujcms_form_type WHERE model_id_ = #{modelId} ) then 1 else 0 end as non_zero_exists
mapper.update: update ujcms_form_type set site_id_ = #{siteId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, model_id_ = #{modelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, process_key_ = #{processKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name_ = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, list_template_ = #{listTemplate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, item_template_ = #{itemTemplate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mode_ = #{mode,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, viewable_ = #{viewable,jdbcType=CHAR}, enabled_ = #{enabled,jdbcType=CHAR} where id_ = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into ujcms_form_type (id_, site_id_, model_id_, process_key_, name_, list_template_, item_template_, mode_, viewable_, order_, enabled_) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{siteId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{modelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{processKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{listTemplate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemTemplate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mode,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{viewable,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{order,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{enabled,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.sql: t.id_, t.site_id_, t.model_id_, t.process_key_, t.name_, t.list_template_, t.item_template_, t.mode_, t.viewable_, t.order_, t.enabled_
